name: Fidget Spinner Toy Simulator
description:
The official fidget spinner simulator is here!

Spin the fidget spinner to increase focus and relieve stress
Or simply test your spinning skills

Unlock and collect some of the best fidget spinner toys

____________________________________________

• 50+ different spinners
• 10 different backgrounds
• 3 game modes: Color, Timed & Endless
• Realistic simulator based on actual physics.
____________________________________________

For all you fidget spinner collectors...
We feature the most popular spinners in every different color, metal and plastic. The top fidget spinner simulator now in your pocket!

Challenge a friend to see who can spin faster!
